name: Scatterbug

evolution.description: Scatterbug can evolve into Spewpa at level 4 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 5 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scatterdust Pokémon. When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon can ignore a negative status condition that results from an enemy move.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.
